channel.title: Slow reactions on my TV
channel.description:
My family recently purchased a new Sony Bravia TV to replace my old one that broke a while ago, and I noticed that when I am playing games on my Playstation 3 there are slow reactions. As in when you move the analogue stick to move the character or whatever, he won't move for around half a second or a second later. This is honestly very annoying and is bogging down my gameplay a lot, as I'm used to instant reactions, etc. So does anybody have any idea on how to fix this, if it is fixable at all?
Also, don't go saying "just get an xbox", keep those comments to yourself, thanks.

item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

It is an LCD problem. If you wanted maximum response time, go with a plasma - they have far better response time over LCDs (and other advantages). Many LCDs have reduced the problem over the years, but some TVs still leak through.
